sentences.english: Is there any special Tenimyu you're longing for?
sentences.chinese: 是否特別期待某一部舞臺劇？

sentences.english: The ICC must decide whether to indict the suspects.
sentences.chinese: 國際刑事法庭必須決定是否起訴這些嫌犯。

sentences.english: A. I’m not sure there’s a magic number, per se.
sentences.chinese: 本質上說，我不肯定是否有一個魔力數字。

sentences.english: Whether to apply to any other CIML Member for a certificate?
sentences.chinese: 是否向其它國家的CIML委員有過申請？

sentences.english: Unplug the jack carefully examined, D-type socket pin bends whether or Broken Needle?
sentences.chinese: 拔下插口仔細檢查，D型插口中是否有彎針或斷針？

sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 確認各聲頻設備是否太靠近電視機。

sentences.english: Talent never goes unrecognized, through constant endeavour will it be seen.
sentences.chinese: 世上沒有懷才不遇，只看你是否百分百爭取。

sentences.english: Are all students of the Department of International Finance here?
sentences.chinese: 國際金融系的學生是否都到了？

sentences.english: Is it true that lack of iodine really causes brain damage?
sentences.chinese: 缺碘是否真的會造成腦損傷？

sentences.english: Is she disgusted that he would so soon betray Anna?
sentences.chinese: 她是否爲他對安娜如此之快的背叛感到反感？

sentences.english: Are you like Maggie and George, stuck living in the suburbs?
sentences.chinese: 是否像M和喬治那樣，在市郊呆板地生活？

sentences.english: As for whether he will visit the DPRK, I am not aware of such an arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 至於他是否去朝鮮，目前我沒有聽說有這方面的安排。

sentences.english: Freaky monster you whether to become the new king of monsters you?
sentences.chinese: 奇特的怪物你是否成爲新國王的怪物嗎？

sentences.english: Have you remained silent in an English conversation because you were afraid of saying something wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你是否因爲擔心自己會講錯英文而在交流時保持沉默？

sentences.english: After making his tea, I asked if it would be all right if I visited him again .
sentences.chinese: 給他泡好茶之後，我問他以後是否可以再來拜訪。

sentences.english: As to whether this accords with legal principle, it is disputable.
sentences.chinese: 但是否符合法律原理，卻值得商榷。

definition: (before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?/Is there a ...?/(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?/Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
to have or have not/surplus and shortfall/tangible and intangible/corporeal and incorporeal
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
as for/as to/to go so far as to
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
